title: NFL Rumors: Tom Brady's time with Pats reportedly could be coming to end (Football 2/27)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to discuss several rumors emerging from the NFL Combine including Tom Brady's future with the Patriots, the Colts reported interest in Philip Rivers, Chris Jones likely getting the franchise tag from the Chiefs, a CBA update and more.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @seanjwagner, @johnbreech
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/

To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
